fields.name: Initial Claims
fields.description: Forms used to start a new VA disability compensation claim or establish an intent to file.

fields.name: Appeals & Decision Review
fields.description: Forms for appealing VA decisions through Supplemental Claims, Higher-Level Review, or Board Appeals.

fields.name: Supporting Statements
fields.description: Forms for submitting personal statements, buddy statements, and supporting evidence for your claim.

fields.name: Special Programs
fields.description: Forms for special VA programs including TDIU (Individual Unemployability), Special Monthly Compensation, and Aid & Attendance.

fields.name: Dependency & Benefits
fields.description: Forms for adding dependents, requesting additional benefits, and updating your personal information.

fields.name: Medical Evidence
fields.description: Forms for submitting medical evidence, authorizing release of medical records, and requesting VA examinations.
